languages.text: "Храни стойкость, {name}. И будь чут{mf|ок|ка} к искусам, что гнездятся на нашем пути".
"Keep steadfast, {name}. And be watchful of the temptations infesting our path."
languages.original_text: "Храни стойкость, {name}. И будь чут{mf|ок|ка} к искусам, что гнездятся на нашем пути".

traits.locale_text: "Keep the resilience, {name}. And be watchful of the temptations infesting our path."

"Keep steadfast, {name}. And be watchful of the temptations infesting our path."

languages.text: "Bleibt standhaft, {name}. Und seid Euch der Versuchungen bewusst, die unseren Weg säumen."
languages.original_text: "Keep steadfast, {name}. And be watchful of the temptations infesting our path."

traits.locale_text: "Bleibt standhaft, {name}. Und seid Euch der Versuchungen bewusst, die unseren Weg säumen."

languages.text: « Restez inébranlable, {name}. Et gardez-vous des tentations qui pavent notre chemin. »
languages.original_text: "Keep steadfast, {name}. And be watchful of the temptations infesting our path."

traits.locale_text: « Restez inébranlable, {name}. Et gardez-vous des tentations qui pavent notre chemin. »

languages.text: 「確固たる心を持つのだ、{name}。そして、我等が道にはびこる誘惑に気をつけよ」
languages.original_text: "Keep steadfast, {name}. And be watchful of the temptations infesting our path."

traits.locale_text: 「確固たる心を持つのだ、{name}。そして、我等が道にはびこる誘惑に気をつけよ」

languages.text: «Manténgase firme, {name}. Y guárdese de las tentaciones que infestan nuestro camino».
languages.original_text: "Keep steadfast, {name}. And be watchful of the temptations infesting our path."

traits.locale_text: «Manténgase firme, {name}. Y guárdese de las tentaciones que infestan nuestro camino».

languages.text: “保持坚定，{name}，要警惕旅途中无处不在的诱惑。”
languages.original_text: "Keep steadfast, {name}. And be watchful of the temptations infesting our path."

traits.locale_text: “保持坚定，{name}，要警惕旅途中无处不在的诱惑。”

languages.text: "Dik dur {name}. Karşımıza çıkacak şeylerin aklını çelmesine izin verme."
languages.original_text: "Keep steadfast, {name}. And be watchful of the temptations infesting our path."
